Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.32843628]Virus:SARS-CoV-2:Inhibition of infection in Vero E6 cells(IC50=0.9 µg/ml);SARS-CoV:Inhibition of infection in Vero E6 cells(IC50=4.2 µg/ml);MERS-CoV:Inhibition of infection in Vero E6 cells(IC50=22 µg/ml);Human rhinovirus (HRV):inhibition of infection in RD cells(IC50=5.7 µg/ml);Human parainﬂuenza virus 3:Inhibition of infection in LLC-MK2 cells(IC50>25 µg/ml);Human Influenza A Virus H1N1:Inhibition of infection In MDCK cells(IC50=0.6 µg/ml);Human Influenza A Virus H7N9:Inhibition of infection In MDCK cells(IC50=0.9 µg/ml).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.32843628]P9R did not cause the hemolysis of Chicken red blood cells.
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: [Ref.32843628]the CC50 of P9R was >300 μg/ml for MDCK, VeroE6 and A549 cells.
Sequence Information.Mechanism of action: Mechanistic studies show that positively charged P9R broadly inhibits viral replication by binding to different viruses and then inhibits virus–host endosomal acidification to prevent the endosomal release of pH-dependent viruses.

Literature.Title: A broad-spectrum virus- and host-targeting peptide against respiratory viruses including influenza virus and SARS-CoV-2.
Literature.Author: Zhao H, To KKW, Sze KH, Yung TT, Bian M, Lam H, Yeung ML, Li C, Chu H, Yuen KY.
